name: Happy Chat Card Battle
description:
Happy Chat Card Battle is a Twitch chat interactive card game where Chatters join either the Red or Blue Deck in order to win against the other Deck!

This game is made for card game streamers as an Intro overlay or a "Be Right Back" overlay just to entertain chat while the streamer is gone.

HOW TO PLAY

This card game's battle system is heavily inspired by the Yu-Gi-Oh! Trading Card Game.

Players start with 8000 Life Points (LP). If your LP hit 0 you lose.

Turn Phases

Draw Phase

Start of Player's turn.

Main Phase

Player starts summoning Chatters. Each Chatter Card spawns with an ATK value between 100 and 3000.

Battle Phase

Player starts attacking the Opponent with their Chatter Cards.

  • Cards can only attack one at a time.
  • If the attacking card has higher ATK, it will destroy the Opponent's Card and deal the resulting damage to the Opponent's LP.
  • If both cards have the same ATK value, both are destroyed.
  • If the Opponent does not have Chatter Cards, Player's Cards can attack directly and deal damage to the Opponent's LP.

End Phase

End of Player's turn.

These sequence of events happens automatically without the Streamer doing any inputs.

In order for a Chatter to join a Deck, one must write:

  • "#1 <emote>" to join Red.
  • "#2 <emote>" to join Blue.

Press ESC if you want to return to the main menu.

Emotes are gathered from Twitch, BTTV and FFZ. Only Static emotes are accepted.

Requires an OAuth Token. Reference: https://twitchapps.com/tmi/

This game uses Lexone's Unity-Twitch-Chat library. Reference: https://github.com/lexonegit/Unity-Twitch-Chat

Twitter: https://twitter.com/JaspmanZX
